GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: dont disable gcc_sleep_clk_src

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 4203b76abe539f3cac258d4cf1e16e2dd95ea60f. For more details please see the references link.
